title: Least Squares Regression Analysis in Engineering Education Through Hybrid Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, engineering mathematics knowledge, and fundamental linear algebra concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-based learning environment using virtual IoT weather observation systems. Learners experience hybrid least-squares regression analysis combining simulations and physical elements via personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can implement and analyze linear, quadratic, and cubic least-squares regression models in a simulated environment.
Learners can submit project outcomes applying least-squares regression to real-world engineering problems using IoT system data
Learners can visually understand and explain the principles of error minimization in regression models through VR-based simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
